name: Illuminate - Light Your Way to Eternity FREE
name_original: Illuminate - Light Your Way to Eternity FREE
description:
Light your way and get till the end! Go through this radical journey, passing rocky roads, darkness, mazes and few other surprises. Glow to reach the furthest distance. Can you beat it?

Follow and collect the lights; go through the maze by controlling the light and avoid as many obstacles as possible to explore the mysterious path!

Playing Illuminate is simple. Touch anywhere on the screen and drag left or right to move the light. Don’t forget to avoid the walls too or your light will fade and the game will be over!

Features:
* Free to download
* Challenging levels
* Endless twists and turns: Play forever and try to beat your friend's top score with Game Center!
* Addictive and fun for all ages!

Illuminate - Light Your Way to Eternity FREE is brought to you by Game.IO.
Game.IO is a company providing you with board and dice reinvented games, as well as casual mini games carefully designed to spark your imagination and put your skills on test.

We very much value your feedback so don’t forget to rate and review! Every single review you write is carefully read and analyzed. Let us know your suggestions or issues you have at support@game.io
Illuminate is free to download, and all levels can be completed without spending any money. The game offers optional in-app purchases.

If you like and enjoy the Illuminate, check out Apex Cube - Jump to the Top FREE and Bounce the Bounce, a fast paced bouncing game with a top notch design for your pleasure!
